title: Game crashes when I (mordekaiser) ulted graves and he dies. (6.6 oce)

replies.body:
Hey there,

The title of your reply implies past-tense, has this happened since? If so could you try [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
